column2: I will, however, commute your sentence to one of three months, with the option of a fine of twenty-five per cent. of the money you have received from the insurance company."
column3: I will, however, commute your sentence to one of three months, with the option of a fine of twenty five per cent. of the money you have received from the insurance company."

column2: They were absent for about ten minutes, and on their return the foreman pronounced the prisoner guilty.
column3: They were absent for about ten minutes, and on their return the foreman pronounced the prisoner guilty.

column2: I shall therefore order that you receive two tablespoonfuls of castor oil daily, until the pleasure of the court be further known."
